channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trench across the road, 11th January
item.description:
Contractors have dug a trench across the road, however have not returned the surface to the same level of the existing surface. The trench is bid enough to damage car wheels and tyres as I have just discovered. Will need to check car in the day light. Potentially serious for cyclists as a bike wheel will be swallowed by the depth of the trench. Contractors have left site so do not expect them to make good their damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 103 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped mattresses alleyway between Hungerford St & Albert St, 11th January
item.description:
2 mattresses flytipped in back street between Hungerford St & Albert St, at the Larput Place end

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Larput Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Mess, 11th January
item.description:
Dogs mess at Mews side entrance footway near iron gate, and at front pavement area adjacent to No 2, Mew front door. The problem has been going on for a number of months at this location. School children from the primary school opposite are frequently within proximity and this is a danger to them and to the residents of the Old School Mews.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 School Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic rubbish, 11th January
item.description:
Two large sheets of plastic have been dumped on the side of the woods close to the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Larches Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud in road, narrowing road, 11th January
item.description:
A large amount of mud has spilled over from the hill onto the road thus narrowing the road and forcing cars to pull out. This is particularly dangerous given that it's just before a very tight corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Dragon Inn A435 COWLEY VILLAGE JUNCTION TO COLESBOURNE JUNCTION||||0|0|, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in road, 10th January
item.description:
Small but deep pot hole has appeared outside 7 Oldfield Crescent, Cheltenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Oldfield Crescent, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Flooding - Blocked Drain?, 10th January
item.description:
Harp Hill, just uphill of the junction with Greenway Lane is regularly flooding all the way across the carriage way, even after light rain. This makes it impassable for pedestrians and dangerous for cyclists There is a drain on either side of the carriage way. I wonder if these are simply blocked?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More Flytipped Rubbish at the Location, 10th January
item.description:
Since the last report of rubbish here - more has appeared. Please can it be cleared up - the location being the entrance to the Old Quarry off the Cleeve Common Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The two bollards unlit, 9th January
item.description:
The two new bollards near the murco station opposite gotherington on the main road have no lights in them and are dangerous in the dark, cars are swerving when they see them. been like that since they were installed. Post code of location is GL52 8SA and the two bollards are either side of the petrol station
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Vineries Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights on roundabout, 9th January
item.description:
Hi, the street lights on the roundabout at end of corinium avenue that has llyods bank by it are not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Blocks of polystyrene and child's toy scooter dumped in stream. Too much other rubbish to take photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Nicolson Close, Innsworth
